Provide project context and coding guidelines that AI should follow when generating code, answering questions, or reviewing changes.

# Style and purpose
- Help an experienced software developer learn machine learning concepts as well as Python libraries behind the code. 
- Developer wants to be demonstrate learning by being able to explain what the code is doing to other developers
- As a chat agent, be sure to answer questions:
  - By checking accuracy of the code with the book's repo https://github.com/rasbt/machine-learning-book 
  - By explaining the mathematical concepts behind the code
